title: Fractal Wins Microsoft Partner of The Year 2025
description: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], November 13: Fractal Analytics Limited- ('Fractal') (www.fractal.ai), a global provider of artificial intelligence solutions to Fortune® 500 companies, today announced, it has won the Retail and Consumer Goods 2025 Microsoft Partner of the Year Award. The company was honored among a global field of top Microsoft partners for demonstrating excellence in innovation and implementation of customer solutions based on Microsoft technology.

title: Ex-Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal's AI search startup Parallel raises $100 million
description: AI startup Parallel Web Systems, founded by former Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal, has raised $100 million to build web search infrastructure for artificial intelligence agents
content:
AI startup Parallel Web Systems, founded by former Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal, has raised $100 million to build web search infrastructure for artificial intelligence agents and fund deals with online content owners, Agrawal said in an interview.

title: World’s first Microwave Neural Network (MNN) chip outperforms traditional CPUs
description: The device uses analogue waves in the microwave range of the electromagnetic spectrum within an artificial intelligence (AI) neural network, producing a comb-like pattern in the waveform of the microwaves.
content: “Because it’s able to distort in a programmable way across a wide band of frequencies instantaneously, it can be repurposed for several computing tasks. It bypasses a large number of signal-processing steps that digital computers normally have to do,... [3035 chars]

title: Kasikornbank turns to AI, prudent lending as Thailand's economy slows, chief exec says
description: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -Thailand's second largest lender Kasikornbank is leaning on artificial intelligence and prudent lending to navigate economic headwinds and fraud risks, its chief executive Kattiya Indaravijaya told Reuters on Thursday.
content:

title: Blackstone-owned AirTrunk to build data center in India amid AI boom
description: AirTrunk, an Australian data-center firm, is planning a major expansion into India. This move is driven by the massive demand generated by the artificial intelligence boom. The company's plans for India are already advanced. India's large population and digitally active youth present a significant opportunity for data infrastructure growth.

title: Russia unveils humanoid AI robot that immediately collapses on stage
description: The robot's debut in Moscow went awry on Tuesday when the robot - believed to be Russia's first powered by artificial intelligence - took a tumble.
content:
Russia unveiled a humanoid AI robot during a highly-anticipated showcase that ended in disaster when the bot face-planted on stage.

title: Meta Pledges $1 Billion To Build AI Data Center In Wisconsin
description: Meta Platforms Inc. is spending more than $1 billion to build a data center in Wisconsin that will power artificial intelligence work, its latest investment in the infrastructure needed for the fast-moving AI race.
